mapper.sql: districtID, districtName, districtNum, address, deliverName, deliverPhone, schoolID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bk_district (districtName, districtNum, address, deliverName, deliverPhone, schoolID) VALUES (#{districtName},#{districtNum},#{address}, #{deliverName},#{deliverPhone},#{schoolID})
mapper.update: UPDATE bk_district SET districtName=#{districtName}, districtNum=#{districtNum}, address=#{address}, deliverName=#{deliverName}, deliverPhone=#{deliverPhone}, schoolID=#{schoolID} WHERE districtID=#{districtID}
